'''''glaur''''' (sometimes applied as '''''glor''''') is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "gold (light or colour)".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, pp. 17, 159</ref>

===Etymology===
In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']], ''glaur'' derives from the [[root]]s "GLAW(-R)", "[[LAWAR|LÁWAR-]]".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entries</ref>

==Examples==
*''[[Glaurung|'''Glaur'''ung]]'' = "Gold-worm"
*''[[Glorfindel|'''Glor'''findel]]''= "Golden-hair"
*''[[Glóredhel|'''Glór'''edhel]]'' = "Golden Elf"

==Cognate==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[laurë]]''
==See also==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[KUL]] ("golden-red")
*For other words glossed as "gold", see ''[[Gold#Names|Gold: Names]]''
